task.title: Referring the HTML Fragment from a Command Line Parameter

step.cmd: Insert the HTML content in a well-formed XML file.
Specify the absolute path to that XML file using the webhelp.fragment.head parameter.

info.note: If you want to insert the content in another location within the output document, you can reference the XML file from any other HTML Fragment extension points.

step.cmd: Click OK to save the changes to the transformation scenario.

result.p: Your additional content will be included at the end of the head element of your output document.
